text: Arthur Davies (11 April 1941 – ) was a Welsh tenor. He had an international performance career from the 1970s through the 1990s. He performed leading roles with The Royal Opera in London, the Welsh National Opera, the Scottish Opera, and the English National Opera."Davies, Arthur", Michael Kennedy and Joyce Bourne, The Concise Oxford Dictionary of Music (1996) Davies was born in Wrexham, Wales. He died in August 2018 at the age of 77."Arthur Davies (1941–2018)", English National Opera, 9 August 2018 His death was announced on August 9. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Profile, Opera Scotland * Sainwales.com * Arthur Davies | AllMusic Category:1941 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Welsh singers
